summary:
FAQ - Only 8192 tokens and no decimals. A single token cannot be split into parts. so you can only trade a whole amount of tokens (like 1, 5, 80 and not 0.99, 5.5, 80.33). 4096x2=8192 - the real scarcity IMPROVED.

 Tokenomics - 0% buy and 5% sell tax with 4% going to burn. As there are no decimals, tax cannot be charged if the amount traded is less than 20 tokens. Every 2 hours or 1024 tokens in traded volume, 1 token gets nuked from LP if its balance is greater than 128.
